alert.note: Alert for East Feliciana; Pointe Coupee; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 12:08PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WEST FELICIANA, POINTE COUPEE AND EAST FELICIANA PARISHES, WILKINSON AND SOUTHWESTERN AMITE COUNTIES THROUGH 100 PM CDT... At 1208 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodville, or 22 miles northwest of Jackson, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Roads, Jackson, St. Francisville, Clinton, Centreville, Woodville, Gloster, Morganza, Wilson, Norwood, Wakefield, Spillman, Batchelor, Lettsworth, Fort Adams, Dolorosa, Felps, and Crosby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Feliciana; Pointe Coupee; West Feliciana
